pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solves Minimum Cost Bipartite Matching Problems // Header library and R functions to solve minimum cost bipartite matching problem using Huhn-Munkres algorithm (Hungarian algorithm; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hungarian_algorithm; Kuhn (1955) doi:10.1002/nav.3800020109). This is a repackaging of code written by Cong Ma in the GitHub repo https://github.com/mcximing/hungarian-algorithm-cpp.
